name: bill cosby
dieMessage: a bill @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@cosby@c-reset@ just wanted to show you a good time.

attackMessages.message: Ohhhh hey baby why don't we hop in a cab back to my place and I can show you my record collection
Don't be bashful sugar, why don't you go sit on my leopard print sofa and I'll go pour us some zinfandel and throw on some tunes
Now now there's no need to be so hasty to head on home baby, just have a few sips of this glass of wine and I'm sure you'll feel a whole lot better

criticalAttackMessages.message: I see you're gettin real tired honey, maybe you had a bit too much of that zinfandel. Why don't we head over to the sofa and lay down for a while.

battleMessages.message: Boy that zinfandel really has us all feeling nice and relaxed now don't it

idleMessages.message: Don't mind me, I'm just headin to the store to grab some more white zinfandel, says @c-magenta@bill cosby@c-reset@.
